short_summary: Add feature to existing supply chain system
description: Contractor will develop new features for the intelligent supply chain system, integrate with existing system, perform operations and provide training. Key tasks include development and integration of new features, maintenance of the system, training to the Government employees, provision of a detailed documentation of the work, and transition to in-house responsibilities.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title
Intelligent Supply Chain (ISC) Additional Feature Development

## Reference Number
PW-22-01009749

## Amendment Number
2

## Solicitation Number
1000244505

## Publication Date
2022-10-10

## Tender Closing Date
2022-10-25T14:00:00

## Amendment Date
2022-10-13

## Expected Contract Start Date
2022-11-15

## Expected Contract End Date
Not specified

## Tender Status
Expired

## GSIN Code
D301A (Computer and Data Processing Services)

## Procurement Category
SRV (Services)

## Notice Type
Request for Proposal (RFP)

## Trade Agreements
World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

## Regions of Opportunity
Canada

## Regions of Delivery
National Capital Region (NCR)

## Contracting Entity
Health Canada

## Solicitation Details
- This RFP is for the development of additional features for the Intelligent Supply Chain (ISC).
- The contractor will utilize subject matter expertise to evolve the ISC through continued feature development, integration services, and operations.
- The contractor will apply a best practice approach to business analysis, software development, data collection, data storage, analytics, web-based application design, and project management.
- The requirement focuses on further automating existing supply chain processes to modernize government capability in order management, inventory management, delivery management, user management, data extraction, and reporting.

## Security Requirements
- The contractor must adhere to Common PS SRCL #34.
- Minimum corporate security required: None. Minimum resource security required: Secret.

## Contact Information
- Beverly Shawana, Contract Authority
- Phone: 613-371-3765
- Email: [beverly.shawana@hc-sc.gc.ca](mailto:beverly.shawana@hc-sc.gc.ca)

## Tender Documents
- The RFP documents are available in English and French.
- Bidders must submit their proposals electronically to the Contract Authority.

## Note
- The tender is open to Qualified Supply Arrangement Holders who have been invited to submit a proposal.
- The Solutions-Based Informatics Professional Services (SBIPS) method of supply is refreshed three times per year.velle
